title: BBC East Yorkshire & Humber Live on Friday 4 November 2016 - BBC News
summary: concerns raised over glass lift plans for humber bridge .
armed robbery at east yorkshire village post office .
ukip mep blasts high court 's article 50 ruling .
north lincolnshire council fails to appoint director of public health .
marsh harrier found shot and badly injured .

documents.title: goodbye : five things we learnt about bbc weather watchers
text: goodbye and thanks for joining us on our live feed today .
as bbc weather watchers celebrates its first anniversary , lets have a look at five things we 've learnt from the wonderful weather reporters out there .
and yes , i am a weather watcher
it 's really easy to become a weather watcher , you just sign up and start uploading reports from anywhere in the country
more than 130,000 people have signed up to be part of the bbc 's weather community and have uploaded almost one million reports
weather watchers across the country have captured rare weather phenomenons , such as these cloud formations in the highlands
it 's also documented some of the uk 's big weather stories , such at the boxing day floods in yorkshire last december
one final thing i have learned , looking at all the photos that we share online , we all love a good sunset !
have a brilliant weekend , i 'll be back on monday with all the latest news , sport , travel and of course your weather
author: Kimberley Metcalfe
BBC Local Live, Hull and East Yorkshire

documents.title: weather : cloud increasing through the evening
text: cloud will increase through the evening with outbreaks of showery rain overnight , occasionally heavy .
northerly winds will strengthen later giving an increasingly cold feel to the night .
lows of 6c .
author: Keeley Donovan
Weather presenter, BBC Look North

documents.title: bridge centre plans under threat
text: bridge centre plans under threat

documents.title: your headlines this evening
text: here are the evening headlines for east yorkshire & the humber :
author: Sophia Ewen
BBC Radio Humberside

documents.title: outbuildings targeted in goole
text: three outbuildings were broken into in the old goole area overnight last weekend .
humberside police are now appealing for any information .
the incidents that occured were on :
author: Kimberley Metcalfe
BBC Local Live, Hull and East Yorkshire

documents.title: breakinghull kingston rovers sign two forwards
text: hull kingston rovers have been boosted by the addition of two more young forwards to their 2017 squad in the shape of kieran moran and new arrival george milton .
the robins have signed 21-year-old prop george milton on a two-year deal from doncaster , making him the club 's fourth new signing .
meanwhile , scottish international keiran moran will honour the deal he signed earlier in the year , which lasts until 2018 .
it 's promising news both for next season and the long-term future of the club to bring these two on board . ''
author: Joshua Cook
BBC Radio Humberside

documents.title: travel : serious accident on a1035
text: some traffic news for those heading out around beverley this evening .
a1035 hull bridge road closed and queuing traffic in both directions .
diversion in operation via beverley and weel .
it 's due to an accident involving two cars and an overturned vehicle .
due to a serious accident on the a1035 hull bridge road has been closed by the police .
services diverting via frodingham # now
a1035 closed in both directions at tickton following road traffic collision - motorists advised to avoid area
any reason why tickton residents not allowed to travel from routh to village ?
thought a1035 closed between bev and hull bridge ?
author: Kimberley Metcalfe
BBC Local Live, Hull and East Yorkshire

documents.title: your headlines this afternoon
text: here are the latest headlines for east yorkshire and the humber :
author: Sophia Ewen
BBC Radio Humberside

documents.title: mixed thoughts over beverley 's flemingate centre
text: east yorkshire 's newest out of town shopping area opened to much fanfare this time last year .
beverley 's flemingate has attracted 1.5 million visitors over the past 12 months .
but has it lived up to the hype ?
independent traders are annoyed that more cafes and smaller units have been allowed to open in the centre , designed for large national chains .
some shoppers say flemingate has been one big disappointment .
i went to speak to businesses in the centre to find out more .
author: Sarah Corker
BBC Look North

documents.title: weather : a chilly afternoon with some showers
text: remaining chilly through the rest of the afternoon with some showery rain in places .
this clearing , becoming mainly confined to costal areas .
strong northwest winds developing later in the night .
temperatures getting down to 5c .
author: Alina Jenkins
BBC Weather

documents.title: hull city : 'we can win games at this level ' says mike phelan
text: hull city 's players should be motivated by a desire to avoid setting a new club record of consecutive premier league defeats when they meet at southampton this weekend .
that 's according to their head coach mike phelan .
the tigers have lost their last six league games .
author: BBC Humberside Sport

documents.title: concerns raised again over proposal for humber bridge development
text: the chair of the humber bridge board says concerns have been raised over plans to build a glass lift in one of the towers .
the structure would take visitors to the top of the bridge .
the plans also include a hotel , offices and a new visitor centre .
the board chair rob waltham says they 'll keep fighting to help develop the humber bridge .
author: Victoria Holland
BBC Look North

documents.title: police search for man after assault
text: police are trying to find a man ( in connection with an assault in high street , cleethorpes just after midnight on 30 october .
the victim required hospital treatment for cuts and bruises on his face .
author: Kimberley Metcalfe
BBC Local Live, Hull and East Yorkshire

documents.title: owain thanks bbc weather watchers
text: our weather presenter owain is celebrating one year of bbc weather watchers - which sees hundreds of people every day sending in their weather shots from around our region .
he wants to say a very big `` thank you '' to everybody who 's taken part so far
here 's @ twitterid chatting about why weather watchers content is so important .
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: bonfire night safety warning from ambulance service
text: if you 're heading out for bonfire night , make sure you stay safe and , most importantly , make sure you know what to do should anything happen .
the yorkshire ambulance service has issued a safety guide for families hosting their own events at home :
in the event of an accident with fireworks or fire this # bonfirenight you need to act quickly :
author: Kimberley Metcalfe
BBC Local Live, Hull and East Yorkshire

documents.title: weather : a cool and cloudy afternoon ahead
text: it 'll be chilly this afternoon with mainly dry conditions and sunny spells in the east .
it 'll be cloudier further west with occasional showers likely at times .
the maximum temperature will be about 9c ( 48f ) .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: your headlines this lunchtime
text: the top stories from our hull newsroom this lunchtime include :
author: Sophia Ewen
BBC Radio Humberside

documents.title: concerns raised over glass lift plans for humber bridge
text: the chair of the humber bridge board says concerns have been raised over plans to build a glass lift in one of the towers .
the proposals would also include a business park and a hotel on the site .
but the board 's chair says east riding of yorkshire council planners have raised issues with the development .
author: BBC Look North
East Yorkshire and Lincolnshire

documents.title: pudsey bear to rock bridlington
text: come and join us for pudsey 's big night as children in need rocks bridlington on friday 18 november .

it 'll be a top night of entertainment with acts such as the garnett family , the andrini sisters , the coastal voices community choir , driffield town brass band and a few familiar faces from bbc look north and bbc radio humberside .
and there 'll be 200 young people from the bridlington area to form the children in need choir .
author: Kimberley Metcalfe
BBC Local Live, Hull and East Yorkshire

documents.title: breakingarmed robbery at village post office
text: a masked gunman tried to rob a post office in an east yorkshire village .
it happened at bugthorpe post office ( below ) yesterday afternoon .
a member of staff left the shop and secured himself in a different part of the building .
after the alarm was activated the offender left the scene , it 's not yet known whether anything was taken .
the offender is described as wearing black clothing , including a waterproof jacket and a mask over his face .
he was around 5ft 8in tall and of average build . ''
humberside police are working with colleagues in north yorkshire to trace the man responsible .
anyone with any information should call 101 .
author: Kimberley Metcalfe
BBC Local Live, Hull and East Yorkshire

documents.title: mbokani boost for hull
text: hull boss mike phelan needs to arrest his team 's alarming slide down the table quickly and should be aided by the return of striker dieumerci mbokani for sunday 's game with southampton .
a hamstring injury has sidelined mbokani for several weeks but phelan told his friday news conference the player is back in training and in contention this weekend .

the head coach added that the game will probably come too soon for midfielder robert snodgrass , who is nevertheless back in training after suffering an ankle injury in the defeat to stoke on 22 october .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: marsh harrier found shot and badly injured
text: an adult female marsh harrier 's been found badly injured on the border between east and north yorkshire .
police are appealing for any information about the incident which took place last month in sledmere .
x-rays showed a damaged wing caused by shotgun pellets .
after three weeks of intensive care , the bird made a full recovery and has been released back into the wild .
author: Pritti Mistry
BBC News Online

documents.title: listen : yorkshire ukip mep blasts high court 's article 50 ruling
text: the brexit process has been thrown into chaos after the high court ruled that theresa may does n't have the legal power to trigger it .
instead , the judges said it 's up to parliament to decide on beginning the formal leaving procedure , known as article 50 .
it means mps and peers could either block brexit or delay it .
mike hookem , ukip mep for yorkshire and north lincolnshire , has told bbc radio humberside he is n't happy about the ruling :

documents.title: your headlines this morning
text: here are the latest headlines across east yorkshire and the humber :
author: Natalie Glanvill
BBC Radio Humberside News

documents.title: listen : 'best person needed ' for public health responsibilities
text: north lincolnshire council has not had a director of public health since the person who used to do the job left eight months ago , it 's emerged .
the role is currently being covered on an interim basis by north east lincolnshire council 's director of public health .
the deputy leader of north lincolnshire council , rob waltham , says it 's not uncommon to share roles - but the authority will now look to recruit someone .
author: Carl Wheatley
BBC Radio Humberside News

documents.title: listen : brexit legal challenge - the view from grimsby
text: the government has suffered a significant defeat at the high court over its plans for leaving the european union .
judges yesterday upheld a legal challenge brought by campaigners who 'd argued that ministers should consult parliament before beginning the formal brexit process .
the government has resisted giving mps such a vote , with the prime minister , theresa may , saying she would trigger article 50 by march next year .
the government 's to appeal against the decision .
i 've been getting reaction to the news from people in grimsby :
author: James Piekos
Reporter, BBC Hull and East Yorkshire

documents.title: happy first birthday bbc weather watchers
text: it 's our first anniversary today !
we want to thank all of you who contribute by uploading your photos and weather reports .
here 's a look at some of the beautiful taken this morning around east yorkshire and north lincolnshire .
not a weather watcher ?
why not sign up here and become part of it ?
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: watch : beverley 's flemingate celebrates a successful year
text: east yorkshire 's newest shopping centre has attracted more than 1.5 million visitors in the last 12 months , it 's been revealed .
beverley 's flemingate opened a year ago today and its owners say the centre has been a major boost to the region .
david donkin , property director at the wykeland group , says the centre has been a major boost :
author: Jo Makel
BBC Look North

documents.title: listen : council fails to appoint director of public health
text: north lincolnshire has n't had a director of public health for the last eight months .
since the last person who did the job left the post , the local authority has n't advertised or recruited anyone for the role .
instead , the director of public health at north east lincolnshire council has been covering the post one day a week .
scunthorpe 's labour mp nic dakin has described this as a `` dereliction of duty '' by north lincolnshire council .
author: Lizzie Rose
BBC Radio Humberside

documents.title: your headlines this morning
text: here are the latest headlines from across east yorkshire and the humber :
author: Natalie Glanvill
BBC Radio Humberside News

text: a165 holderness road in hull is partially blocked between the a1033 mount pleasant junction and the b1237 saltshouse road junction , because of an accident .

text: it 'll be chilly today with mainly dry conditions and sunny spells in the east .
winds remaining mainly light , with highs of 9c ( 48f ) .

documents.title: traffic and travel : delays on a63 eastbound
text: one lane 's closed and there 's currently queuing traffic on the a63 eastbound in south cave , just before the slip road .
it 's because of an accident involving two vehicles .

documents.title: our live coverage across east yorkshire and the humber
text: welcome to today 's live feed across east yorkshire and the humber on 4 november 2016 .
i 'll be with you until 18:00 with all the latest news , sport , travel and weather .
if there 's anything you 'd like to get in touch with me about , you can do so via email , facebook and twitter .
it 's chilly out there today and thank you to snowy for sending this photo earlier this morning , i 'll have the full forecast for you shortly :
author: Kimberley Metcalfe
BBC Local Live, Hull and East Yorkshire
